GameObject.KindOf: SELECTABLE CAN_ATTACK CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS INFANTRY COMMANDO SCORE UNIQUE_UNIT SKIRMISH_AI_DONT_GARRISON AMPHIBIOUS IGNORE_FORCE_MOVE CAN_PLACE_CHARGE CAN_BE_FAVORITE_UNIT PATH_THROUGH_INFANTRY

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_CINA" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromCINA") elseif Prev == "STATE_Suppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromSuppressed") elseif Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachuting") elseif Prev == "STATE_SelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SelectedToIdle") elseif Prev == "STATE_stunned_flailing" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("STATE_stunned") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ParachuteLaunch" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toParachuting") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_Suppressed" and Prev ~= "TRANS_toSuppressed" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toSuppressed") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_OverWater" and Prev ~= "TRANS_ToWater" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ToWater") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_OverWater" or Prev == "TRANS_ToWater" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_FromWater") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachuting") end if Prev == "STATE_bored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IdleToSelected") end

DieMuxData.DeathTypesForbidden: MAULED ELECTROCUTED LASERED BURNED STABBED IRRADIATED
